title: Surgery of the ear and temporal bone
abstract: I EXAMINATION OF THE EAR * Office Examination of the Ear Joseph B. Nadol, Jr. and Harold F. Schuknecht * Photography and Documentation of Pathological Findings Steven D. Rauch and Jeffrey Spiegel * Audiologic Tests for Otologic Surgery Dianne H. Meyer and Edward L. Applebaum * Imaging of the Temporal Bone Hugh D. Curtin and Osamu Sakai * Evaluation of the Vestibular System Conrad Wall, III, Richard F. Lewis, and Steven D. Rauch * Evaluation of Facial Paralysis Arvind Kumar, Arlene Barr and Aftab Patni * Intraoperative Monitoring of the Facial Nerve and Hearing Robert A. Levine, Steven F. Ronner and Aaron R. Thornton * Outcome Measurements for Ear Surgery Pa-Chun Wang, Richard E. Gliklich and Joseph B. Nadol, Jr. II SOFT TISSUE APPROACHES AND MANAGEMENT * Incisions and Approaches Joseph B. Nadol, Jr * Skin Grafting in Otologic Surgery Joseph B. Nadol, Jr. and Harold F. Schuknecht III OSSEOUS APPROACHES TO THE TEMPORAL BONE * Osseous Approaches to the Temporal Bone Joseph B. Nadol, Jr. * Transtemporal and Transpetrous Approaches to the Cranial Base Michael J. McKenna * Management of Soft Tissue and Osseous Stenosis of the Ear Canal and Canalplasty Steven D. Rauch * Perforations of the Tympanic Membrane Dennis S. Poe * Granular Myringitis Richard M. Levinson IV SURGERY FOR DISORDERS OF THE EAR CANAL AND TYMPANIC MEMBRANE * Acute Mastoiditis Michael J. McKenna and Roland D. Eavey * Chronic Otitis Media Joseph B. Nadol, Jr. * Complications of Chronic Otitis Media Jeffrey P. Harris, David W. Kim and David H. Darrow * Osteoradionecrosis of the Temporal Bone Joseph B. Nadol, Jr. * Malignant External Otitis Marlene L. Durand V SURGERY FOR CONDUCTIVE HEARING LOSS * Otitis Media with Effusion Michael J. Cunningham and Roland D. Eavey * Surgery for Otosclerosis Joseph B. Nadol, Jr. and Harold F. Schuknecht (deceased) * Ossiculoplasty and Tympanoplasty in Chronic Otitis Media Saumil N. Merchant * Congenital Aural Atresia Antonio De la Cruz and Jose N. Fayad * Congenital Cholesteatoma Trevor J. McGill and Reza Rahbar VI SURGERY FOR SENSORINEURAL HEARING LOSS * Surgery for Sensorineural Hearing Loss: Perilymph Fistula Steven D. Rauch * Cochlear Implantation and Implantable Hearing Aids Joseph B. Nadol, Jr. VII SURGERY FOR VERTIGO * Labyrinthectomy Joseph B. Nadol, Jr. and Michael J. McKenna * Shunt Procedures Harold F. Schuknecht (posthumous) and Michael J. McKenna

topics.display_name: Facial Nerve Paralysis Treatment and Research
